p:
Results of this study showed monoterpenes 1,8-cineole, linalool acetate, and α-terpinyl acetate are the major constituents of Salvia mirzayanii essential oil. Our results are consistent with a previous study, which showed linalyl acetate (7.6%) and 1,8-cineole (8.0%) were 2 major volatile compounds of Salvia mirzayanii.
14 However, Khoshnoud et al found that eudesm-7(11)-en-4-ol (15%) and 1,8-cineole were the 2 identified major compounds of Salvia mirzayanii essential oil.
15 Furthermore, spathulenol (10.4%), δ-cadinene (5.8%), and linalool (5.2%) were dominant compounds in another report.
16
